maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.orig: Vagabond
maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.text: Vagabond

maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.orig: Four by the number, the trials can be a found in Sapphire Ridge.
maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.text: Les épreuves, 4 de par leur nombre, se trouvent sur la \v[area.forest.name].

maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.orig: Each one guarded by a \c[3]golden bug, holding a lantern\c[0].
maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.text: Chacune est gardée par un \c[3]Scarabée d'Or, tenant une lanterne\c[0].

maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.orig: And each one testing you with a trial. Only those who overcome them may move forward.
maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.text: Et chacun d'entre eux vous testera avec une épreuve. Seul ceux qui les maitriseront pourront avancer.

maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.orig: The first is the \c[3]Trial of Vigor\c[0]. It can be found in the \c[3]Nesting Grounds\c[0], an easily missed cave north of the \c[3]Eroded Passage\c[0].
maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.text: Le premier est l'\c[3]Épreuve de Vigueur\c[0]. Vous le trouverez dans les \c[3]Terres de Pontes\c[0], une grotte que l'on rate facilement au nord du \c[3]Passage Érodé\c[0].

maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.orig: The second is to be completed at the \c[3]Flower Lake\c[0] and is called the \c[3]Trial of Patience\c[0].
maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.text: Le second doit être réussi au \c[3]Lac Fleuri\c[0] et s'appelle l'\c[3]Épreuve de Patience\c[0].

maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.orig: The third goes by the name \c[3]Trial of Agility\c[0] and is found at \c[3]Carved Pathway\c[0].
maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.text: Le troisième est l'\c[3]Épreuve d'Agilité\c[0] et se trouve au \c[3]\v[area.forest.landmark.name.upper]\c[0].

maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.orig: And the last is not far from here by the \c[3]Bamboo Thicket\c[0] and is called the \c[3]Trial of Insight\c[0].
maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.text: Et le dernier n'est pas loin d'ici, dans la \c[3]Brousse aux Bambous\c[0] et s'appelle l'\c[3]Épreuve de Perspicacité\c[0].

maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.orig: Once all trials are completed, you shall return to me. Understood?
maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.text: Quand toutes les épreuves seront réussies, vous devrez revenir me voir. Compris ?

maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.orig: [nods]
maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.text: [acquiesce]

maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.orig: Good. Stay ever vigilant, Seeker.
maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.text: Bien. Restez toujours vigilant, \v[lore.title.seeker].

maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.orig: Vagabond
maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.text: Vagabond

maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.orig: Seeker...
maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.text: \v[lore.title.seeker]...

maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.orig: I have been expecting you. The golden guardians of the Ridge have whispered of your feats.
maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.text: Je m'attendais à vous voir. Les gardiens dorés de la Crête ont narré vos exploits.

maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.orig: However...
maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.text: Mais...

maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.orig: You have yet to complete one final trial.
maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.text: ... Il vous reste encore à accomplir une dernière épreuve.

maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.orig: ...How?
maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.text: ... Comment ?

maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.orig: It is simple.
maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.text: C'est simple.

maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.orig: Take this key.
maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.text: Prenez cette clef.

maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.orig: \v[item.439.name]
maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.text: \v[item.439.name]

maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.orig: Vagabond
maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.text: Vagabond

maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.orig: This will grant you access to a long forgotten \c[3]Dojo\c[0] hidden in the \c[3]north-east of \v[area.forest.name]\c[0].
maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.text: Elle vous donnera accès à un \c[3]Dojo\c[0] oublié depuis longtemps, caché dans le \c[3]nord-est de la \v[area.forest.name]\c[0].

maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.orig: There your \c[3]last trial\c[0] shall begin and we will see if you are \c[3]worthy of the shade\c[0].
maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.text: C'est ici que votre \c[3]dernière épreuve\c[0] aura lieu et que nous verrons si vous êtes \c[3]digne du symbole\c[0].

maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.orig: I can see the determination glowing in your eyes, Seeker.
maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.text: Je peux voir la détermination briller dans vos yeux, \v[lore.title.seeker].

maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.orig: Don't let it burn you. Remember what you learned and act wisely.
maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.text: Ne la laissez pas vous consumer. Souvenez-vous de ce que vous avez appris et agissez sagement.

maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.orig: [nods]
maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.text: [acquiesce]

maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.orig: Good. Now go, I will meet you at the Dojo.
maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.text: Bien. Maintenant, partez, je vous rencontrerais au Dojo.

maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.orig: Stay ever vigilant, Seeker.
maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.text: Restez toujours vigilant, \v[lore.title.seeker].

maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.orig: Vagabond
maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.text: Vagabond

maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.orig: It has been a while since a Seeker visited me.
maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.text: Cela fait depuis longtemps qu'un \v[lore.title.seeker] n'était pas venu me voir.

maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.orig: Most gave up by this point, not capable of handling the power they've been given.
maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.text: La plupart d'entre eux ont abandonnés à ce point-là, incapable de maitriser le pouvoir qu'ils ont reçu.

maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.orig: Are you any different, Seeker?
maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.text: Êtes-vous différent d'eux, \v[lore.title.seeker] ?

maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.orig: Well, it shall remain to be seen.
maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.text: Eh bien, cela reste à voir.

maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.orig: I know what you came here for. It's the \c[3]last shade\c[0] you seek, correct?
maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.text: Je sais ce pourquoi vous êtes venu ici. C'est le \c[3]dernier symbole\c[0] que vous cherchez, pas vrai ?

maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.orig: [nods]
maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.text: [acquiesce]

maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.orig: I'm merely a simple man, but I was blessed with the task to help any soul that needs guidance.
maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.text: Je ne suis qu'un simple homme, mais j'ai été gratifié de la tâche d'aider tout âme cherchant son chemin.

maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.orig: So, if it is the shade you seek, 4 trials you must pass.
maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.text: Donc si c'est le symbole que vous cherchez, vous devrez réussir 4 épreuves.

maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.orig: ...Why?
maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.text: ... Pourquoi ?

maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.orig: Why, to \c[3]unlock a path\c[0]. One that shall be revealed once you have completed them all.
maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.text: Pourquoi ? Pour \c[3]débloquer un chemin\c[0]. Un qui ne sera révélé que quand vous aurez terminé toutes les épreuves.

maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.orig: Four by the number, the trials can be found in Sapphire Ridge.
maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.text: Les épreuves, 4 de par leur nombre, se trouvent sur la \v[area.forest.name].

maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.orig: Each one guarded by a \c[3]golden bug, holding a lantern\c[0].
maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.text: Chacune est gardée par un \c[3]Scarabée d'Or, tenant une lanterne\c[0].

maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.orig: And each one testing you with a trial. Only those who overcome them may move forward.
maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.text: Et chacun d'entre eux vous testera avec une épreuve. Seul ceux qui les maitriseront pourront avancer.

maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.orig: The first is the \c[3]Trial of Vigor\c[0]. It can be found in the \c[3]Nesting Grounds\c[0], an easily missed cave north of the \c[3]Eroded Passage\c[0].
maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.text: Le premier est l'\c[3]Épreuve de Vigueur\c[0]. Vous le trouverez dans les \c[3]Terres de Pontes\c[0], une grotte que l'on rate facilement au nord du \c[3]Passage Érodé\c[0].

maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.orig: The second is to be completed at the \c[3]Flower Lake\c[0] and is called the \c[3]Trial of Patience\c[0].
maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.text: Le second doit être réussi au \c[3]Lac Fleuri\c[0] et s'appelle l'\c[3]Épreuve de Patience\c[0].

maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.orig: The third goes by the name \c[3]Trial of Agility\c[0] and is found in the \c[3]Carved Pathway\c[0].
maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.text: Le troisième est l'\c[3]Épreuve d'Agilité\c[0] et se trouve au \c[3]\v[area.forest.landmark.name.upper]\c[0].

maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.orig: And the last is not far from here by the \c[3]Bamboo Thicket\c[0] and is called the \c[3]Trial of Insight\c[0].
maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.text: Et le dernier n'est pas loin d'ici, dans la \c[3]Brousse aux Bambous\c[0] et s'appelle l'\c[3]Épreuve de Perspicacité\c[0].

maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.orig: Once all trials are completed, you shall return to me. Understood?
maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.text: Quand toutes les épreuves seront réussies, vous devrez revenir me voir. Compris ?

maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.orig: [nods]
maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.text: [acquiesce]

maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.orig: Good. Stay ever vigilant, Seeker.
maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.text: Bien. Restez toujours vigilant, \v[lore.title.seeker].

maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.orig: Solve the quest \c[3]Trials of the Golden Bugs\c[0].
maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.text: Résolvez la quête \c[3]Épreuves des Scarabées d'Or\c[0].

maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.orig: Four... four \c[3]golden bugs\c[0], he says. I really don't like where this is going...
maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.text: Quatre... quatre \c[3]scarabées d'or\c[0], qu'il dit. Je sens que je ne vais pas aimer ça...

maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.orig: M-Maybe they're friendly bugs?
maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.text: P-Peut-être que ce sont de gentils scarabées ?

maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.orig: There can be no friendly bugs, Tronny. Never.
maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.text: Il ne peut pas y avoir de gentils scarabées, Tronny. Jamais.

maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.orig: I can see how these trials will prove quite the challenge for you, Pentafist.
maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.text: Je peux voir que ces épreuves seront pour toi un véritable défi, Pentafist.

maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.orig: Shut your mouth, Grasshead!
maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.text: Tais-toi, Tête d'Herbe !

maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.orig: Come on, Emilie. I know bugs are horrible, but I'm sure you can take it.
maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.text: Aller, Emilie. Je sais que les scarabées sont horribles, mais je suis sûr que tu vas y arriver.

maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.orig: Look, it's complicated....
maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/3.text: C'est que, c'est compliqué...

maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/4.text: Ah, la \v[area.forest.name]...\. C'était le bon temps.

maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/4.orig: I played this part together with Lukas.
maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/4.text: J'ai joué cette partie avec Lukas.

maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/4.orig: The Trial of Patience was the best.
maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/4.text: L'Épreuve de patience était la meilleure.

maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/4.orig: We did the challenge in parallel and I just kept miscounting on purpose.
maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/4.text: Tous les deux on a fait l'épreuve en parallèle et je faisais exprès de mal compter.
Lukas l'a raté genre trois fois !

maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/4.orig: Well...\. He finally did it on his fourth attempt.
maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/4.text: Oui bon...\. Il a finalement réussi à sa quatrième tentative.

maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/4.orig: Because he kept pushing me into the pond whenever the bamboo tipped.
maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/4.text: Parce qu'à chaque fois que le bambou tombait, il me poussait dans l'eau.

maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/4.orig:
Eventually, I understood what was going on.\.
\.
She was more than a means to an end.\.
\.
I finally realized...\. that I found a new friend.
maps/forest/path-04-vaga.json/entities/4.text:
Au final, j'ai fini par comprendre.\.
\.
Elle n'était pas qu'un moyen pour arriver à une fin.\.
\.
J'ai fini par réaliser...\. que j'avais trouvé une nouvelle amie.
